title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from the table and display them in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
